alert.note: Alert for Central Carbon County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued December 13 at 2:26AM MST until December 14 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM NOON MST TODAY THROUGH TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Wind speeds will increase to 30 to 40 mph this afternoon with gusts around 60 mph possible. This wind is expected to occur through tonight. * WHERE...Central Carbon County. * WHEN...From noon MST today through Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.
